Name: Allegrottini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Cleansing and citrusy with moderate sourness.
History: Adapted from a cocktail discovered in 2005 at the Four Seasons Hotel in Prague, Czech Republic.
Nutrition: One serving of Allegrottini contains 173 calories
